choose.when: AND m.uid IN (SELECT u.id FROM f_user_account u INNER JOIN f_user_role r ON u.id=r.user_id WHERE r.role_id in (2,3,4))
AND m.uid IN (SELECT c.uid FROM f_user_customer c WHERE fid=(SELECT fid FROM f_user_customer WHERE uid=#{uid}))

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM f_mesh m INNER JOIN f_project p ON m.project_id = p.id INNER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(1) pcount,mid FROM f_place GROUP BY mid) pl ON pl.mid=m.id INNER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(1) scount,mid FROM f_scene GROUP BY mid) s ON s.mid=m.id WHERE 1=1
AND m.mname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{mname},'%')
AND m.mesh_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{meshId},'%')
AND p.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pname},'%')

SELECT g.id, m.id mid, IFNULL(g.gname,'null') gname, p.name, m.project_id, m.mname, m.mesh_id, pl.pname, pl.id pid, IFNULL(l.lcount,0) lcount FROM f_group g INNER JOIN f_mesh m ON m.id=g.mid INNER JOIN f_project p ON p.id=m.project_id LEFT JOIN f_place pl ON pl.id=g.pid LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(1) lcount,gid FROM f_light GROUP BY gid) l ON l.gid=g.id WHERE g.id=#{id}

#{id}

LIMIT 1
